document.bingtitle: Can you use a food stamp EBT card at mcdonalds? - Yahoo! Answers
document.webtitle: Can you use a food stamp EBT card at mcdonalds? - Yahoo! Answers
document.description: ... not ebt food food stamps, there are cash food stamps that can be put on the ... No but there is a credit card that looks like an ebt card

What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Dining Out > Fast Food > Resolved Question So Blessed! Member since: October 06, 2007 Total points: 397 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » Can you use a food stamp EBT card at mcdonalds? i know it sounds crazy but i could have sworn yesterday this lady used one. 5 years ago Report Abuse by jefskta Member since: July 06, 2006 Total points: 339 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters nope, but you can use em at donut shops....private ones anyway (no dunkin donuts) to buy cakes and donuts and coffee! and at a few gas stations too! 5 years ago Report Abuse 40% 2 Votes 1 person rated this as good
Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 4 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS
? Some restaurants take the EBT card. McDonald's Doesn't here in Los Angeles, CA, but Jack in the Box, El Pollo Loco and Subways does. It's the restaurant meals program and is only for homeless, elderly, and disabled food benefit recipients. Report Abuse Desireé had Riley 12/27/09 u can use the ebt CASH at mcdonalds not ebt food food stamps, there are cash food stamps that can be put on the ebt card too. at least thats how it is in ny. Report Abuse becky When applying for SNAP (foodstamps), as a homeless person, then it is possible to purchase prepared foods from certain places as they have no means to prepare hot meals. I do know Meals on Wheels in Maine takes SNAP for hot meals, but not sure of the other restaurant. Report Abuse becky The little blue EBT card is also a debit card. If a person qualifies for cash assistance it is placed on the card as cash and can be withdrawn and used to pay bills or whatever they wish, just like a bank card. It is accepted anywhere you see the QUEST emblem, kind of like a VISA. Report Abuse
* You must be logged into Answers to add comments. Sign in or Register .
Other Answers (16) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by demetrious c Member since: November 24, 2006 Total points: 200 (Level 1) Add Contact Block no but you can get a mcdonald's card. 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by iceprinc... Member since: August 31, 2006 Total points: 7,974 (Level 5) Add Contact Block If they are using it at MC Donald's they should not be allowed to have it. That should be used at a store for good healthy food like fruits, veggies, milk, meat, etc. That is what is wrong with this system today. There are to many people on it that is abusing it and when someone really needs to be on it they cant because of all the dead beats that are bleeding the system dry. 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes 2 people rated this as good by Nappy Bumbaclot Member since: September 20, 2006 Total points: 674 (Level 2) Add Contact Block No you can't. Don't you just hate when you ask a question and all these dumb answers that people give just beat around the bush and people give their opinions without actually answering the question- JUST ANSWER THE QUESTION ALREADY !!!! 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes 4 people rated this as good by o0oandre... Member since: June 16, 2006 Total points: 366 (Level 2) Add Contact Block I've seen people use them at Gas stations, buying sandwhiches and pop and stuff....but not McD's.... 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes 1 person rated this as good by princess Member since: June 24, 2006 Total points: 205 (Level 1) Add Contact Block No. You cannot purchase hot food on an EBT card. You can only purchase stuff like cereal, bread, weiners...you know some stuff you find in the grocer store.. 5 years ago Report Abuse 20% 1 Vote 3 people rated this as good by what did you say Member since: March 16, 2007 Total points: 4,367 (Level 4) Add Contact Block No but there is a credit card that looks like an ebt card 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes 3 people rated this as good by aimster2... Member since: October 17, 2007 Total points: 1,362 (Level 3) Add Contact Block No you can't EBT cards can only be used for non cooked food items, You can't even use them for the deli's in the grocery stores. I worked at a grocery store for like 4 years I thought that was crazy they couldnt get fried chicken for dinner unless it was COLD from yesterday on EBT 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes 3 people rated this as good by marie_ro... Member since: February 20, 2006 Total points: 1,765 (Level 3) Add Contact Block I hope it was just a gift card. Would hate to think a person could use food stamps at a fast food. 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes 2 people rated this as good by BrianB Member since: February 28, 2006 Total points: 38,590 (Level 7) Add Contact Block No! its prepared food!! 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes 1 person rated this as good by Miss Redwing Member since: May 25, 2006 Total points: 2,624 (Level 4) Add Contact Block No! Probably was a debit card or gift card. 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Drill Sergeant Mommy Member since: March 19, 2007 Total points: 2,245 (Level 3) Add Contact Block No you can't. Only at grocery stores and I've seen people use them at Wal-mart for food and if they get cash benefits as well. 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by pyt20 EAGLES FAN!.. ♫ fo sho♫ Member since: February 24, 2007 Total points: 44,241 (Level 7) Add Contact Block no u can't, i wish u could but u can't, it would make no sense for them to that anyway cause u can't buy hot food on ebt anyway so all u would be able to get there was sodas,salads, or icecreams anyway
and for some of the ignorant ppl who replied above u can still have a job and receive food stamps so ain't no lazy about it Source(s): ebt card user 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes 3 people rated this as good by DreamGir... Member since: January 18, 2007 Total points: 1,206 (Level 3) Add Contact Block I am pretty sure that they can't be used on pre-prepared food. I would hate to think that all of that tax money is going to somebodys fast food crap instead of putting good food on their kids plates. 5 years ago Report Abuse 20% 1 Vote 3 people rated this as good by Roo06 Member since: May 16, 2007 Total points: 617 (Level 2) Add Contact Block NO EBT CASH yes 5 years ago Report Abuse 20% 1 Vote 1 person rated this as good by suitt05 Member since: September 28, 2007 Total points: 616 (Level 2) Add Contact Block NO. 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Baby0219 Member since: July 18, 2007 Total points: 686 (Level 2) Add Contact Block In California you can use it at any fast food place but I think thats the only state that lets you. 5 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes 1 person rated this as good
